\maketitle

\abstracts{
The decay distribution of the kinematic variable $\xi_u$ in
inclusive charmless semileptonic decays of $B$ mesons is unique.
The novel method for a model-independent determination of
$|V_{ub}|$ is described.
}

\section{Problems and Solutions
author: Changhao Jin
title: Model-independent Determination of $|V_{\lowercase{ub}}|$
